column1: 36472,Daken: Dark Wolverine (2010) #18,18,17806,116,"With the final battle for Hollywood approaching, Daken is still weakened and lacking his healing factor while Donna's forced addiction to the HEAT drug leaves him betrayed and alone. Can his enforced alliance with The Runaways lead him towards some form of redemption? And even with the teenagers'powers at his side, will it be enough to defeat the most dangerous member of The Pride?",
